channel.title: Invisionv2
channel.description:
Intro: Ummm i want to restart invision so me and my team decided to make v2 for more pking :D
Server Features: Better spawntab: credits to whoever made them Pkskill tab: credits to eyfia New welcome screen: credits to whoever made it 4 minigames: Nazi, Experimental, Frostdrag, dominiontower Gold4Points system + gold exchanged system boss point system pk streaks with its own unique shouter 1 easy quest for a dragon defender donator system: earn 10m and exchange it for a donator status 10 bosses surpise boxes
Going to add or wishing to add Clan pvp healing darts paralyzing darts poison darts bounty hunter more custom made minigames grandexchange
Pictures will be uploaded in a minute :D Or probably a video cause i think its faster?

item.title: Invisionv2
item.dc:creator: @InvisionX InvisionX
item.description:
@InvisionX wrote:

You did mention that pictures would be uploaded in a minute, correct?

Well, this thread was created on September 5th. It’s currently September 10th. You sir, are a liar!

Goodluck, nonetheless.

srry been busy latey on school but i will add pic asps

Read full topic

item.title: Invisionv2

item.description:
@si_force wrote:

Why would you add bounty hunter if people hated it in the first place? You should try adding popular features, not features that have caused players to quit runescape.

Intro: Ummm i want to restart invision so me and my team decided to make v2 for more pking

Server Features:
Better spawntab: credits to whoever made them
Pkskill tab: credits to eyfia
New welcome screen: credits to whoever made it
4 minigames: Nazi, Experimental, Frostdrag, dominiontower
Gold4Points system + gold exchanged system
boss point system
pk streaks with its own unique shouter
1 easy quest for a dragon defender
donator system: earn 10m and exchange it for a donator status
10 bosses
surpise boxes

Going to add or wishing to add
Clan pvp
healing darts
paralyzing darts
poison darts
bounty hunter
more custom made minigames
